name: Circle Adventures | United Game Jam
description:
=======================================

This Game was made for my first ever game jam

Game Jam: United Game Jam

Theme: Two

How does the game fit the theme: 2 Dimensions, 2 Players

=======================================

This game is about 2 Circles, which try to solve puzzles and go to the next level. In every level, you'll be introduced to some new elements. Because of the time restriction, I hadn't enough time to add more features, but I'll try to add more, after the jam is over. To go to the next level, you have to go to the exit on the other side of the screen.
